title: Are wedding customs permissible in Islam (Groom giving money 2 siblings of bride to enter room Assim
transcript: bangladesh we have a custom we when my brother-in-law comes to take his wife which is my sister we have a gate outside of the door and in order for him to pass he has to pay like a toll he has to pay a fee for her siblings her uh parents and so is this permissible or not if this has nothing to do with any pagan customs or any disbelieving religions kafir religions and it's just a custom there's nothing wrong in that as long as he's doing it willingly inshallah real from you
